definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Jewish holy sites were not maintained, and their cemeteries had been desecrated .
sentences.chinese: 因此猶太人的聖地不再得到維護，墓園被褻瀆。

sentences.english: There was a pomegranate tree near the entrance to the cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 墓園的入口邊上有株石榴樹。

sentences.english: After recording the location of the cemetery, document the inscriptions on the headstones .
sentences.chinese: 找出墓園的位置後，將墓碑上的碑文記錄下來。

sentences.english: Catholic churches and cemeteries have been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 天主教教堂和墓園都紛紛被毀。

sentences.english: Jewish holy sites were not maintained, and their cemeteries had been desecrated.
sentences.chinese: 因此猶太人的聖地不再得到維護，墓園被褻瀆。

sentences.english: On the Pure Brightness, we held a memorial service for martyrs in the funerary park.
sentences.chinese: 清明節那天我們在墓園裏墓祭了烈士們的英靈。

sentences.english: This is the actual order for the Hartsdale Pet Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 這則命令實際針對哈茨代爾寵物墓園。

sentences.english: It is to be carried to the churchyard in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 要在晚上運到禮拜堂的墓園。

sentences.english: General Robert E. Lee decided not to attack the hill immediately. He would wait for more men.
sentences.chinese: 李將軍決定不立即進攻墓園山，他要等候援軍。

sentences.english: In these Necropolises , Markal will be able to reinforce his army.
sentences.chinese: 馬卡爾可以在這些墓園城中擴張他的軍隊。

sentences.english: A late night cab ride takes a dark turn when you get stuck in an eerie cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 夜歸的出租車把你帶到了一片令人毛骨悚然的墓園。

sentences.english: Vandals desecrated many tombstones in the cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 破壞狂褻瀆了許多墓園中的墓碑。

sentences.english: Markal will be able to reinforce his army.
sentences.chinese: 馬卡爾可以在這些墓園城中擴張他的軍隊。

sentences.english: With the letter in my pocket, I drove to the cemetery, to Hanna's grave.
sentences.chinese: 我把信裝在口袋裏，向墓園馳去，來到漢娜的墓前。

sentences.english: Karen and her husband contact a local cemetery about a burial plot.
sentences.chinese: 凱倫與丈夫聯繫了當地的墓園商討安葬地的事宜。

definition: to sweep a grave (and pay one's respects to the dead person)
